front.title: IANA Registering Geopriv Interior Locations in a TLV Format

abstract.t: This document IANA registers XML elements of interior locations <INT> in a common TLV format. The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC 2119].
